snippet: Opera, of all the art forms, is singularly associated with food, whether because of the appetites of well-girthed singers or the sensual pleasures celebrated in its music.
abstract: Food is associated with opera perhaps more than any other art form and singers regularly eat and drink on stage.
lead_paragraph: Opera, of all the art forms, is singularly associated with food, whether because of the appetites of well-girthed singers or the sensual pleasures celebrated in its music.

headline.seo: Opera Singers Who Dine as Part of the Show
headline.main: Don’t Sing With Your Mouth Full
headline.print_headline: Don’t Sing With Your Mouth Full
